title: XOR With a Twist
description:
XOR encryption uses a key to scramble data.

Your task: Decrypt the following hex string using a single-byte XOR key:

1d0f141f3b0e1c3a1d0f1c0e3a1b

 The flag format is FLAG{decrypted_text}
hints: Try brute forcing a single-byte key
CyberChef has an XOR Brute Force tool
